definition: Panmunjeom, the Joint Security Area in the Korean demilitarized zone
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
Panmunjom village on the DMZ between North and South Korea
pinyin: Ban3 men2 dian4 ting2 zhan4 cun1

sentences.english: The two sides met in the border village of Panmunjom in the Demilitarized Zone.
sentences.chinese: 两国高层军事谈判在非军事区内的板门店举行。

sentences.english: Last Sept. 30, the two Koreas hold military talks in Panmunjom.
sentences.chinese: 去年9月30日，朝韩双方曾在板门店举行军事会谈。

sentences.english: North Koreans work in the fields near Panmunjom in the demilitarized zone.
sentences.chinese: 在非军事区板门店附近，北朝鲜人在田里干活儿。

sentences.english: Pre- representatives from both countries appeared amicable as they met at the truth village of Panmunjom on the border.
sentences.chinese: 双方前代表在两国边境村庄板门店会晤时显得很友好。

sentences.english: Peace talks began, first at Kaesong, then at Panmunjom.
sentences.chinese: 和谈开始，首先在开城，然后在板门店。

sentences.english: Officers from each side met at the truce village of Panmunjom.
sentences.chinese: 各方官员在板门店休战村会见。

sentences.english: Here, North Korean soldiers stand guard in Panmunjom this April.
sentences.chinese: 今年4月，北朝鲜的战士在板门店站岗。

definition: North and South Korea/bilateral Korean relations
summit talks/discussion between heads of state
Moon Jae-in (1953-), Korean politician and human rights lawyer, president of Korea from 2017
